title: Citi's Nathan Sheets visits Bloomberg Rewind
summary: Nathan Sheets, Citi Global Head of International Economics, recently visited Bloomberg TV's Rewind discussing why he's bullish on China, how the unemployment rate will impact the U.S. fed tightening credit, and energy growth.
tag-1: Citi's Nathan Sheets visits Bloomberg Rewind
